text: Georges St-Pierre (born May 19, 1981 in Saint-Isidore, Quebec) (often called GSP for short) is a semi-retired Canadian mixed martial artist that fights for the UFC and fights out of Montreal, Quebec. St-Pierre has won the UFC Welterweight Championship 3 times. St-Pierre is a 3rd degree black belt in Kyokushin, a black belt in Gaidojutsu and a black belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. On December 13, 2013, he announced that he was vacating the championship and was taking time off from MMA.It's official: Georges St-Pierre vacating UFC welterweight title ==References== ==Other websites== *Georges St-Pierre's Official website *Georges St-Pierre at ufc.com Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Quebec
title: Georges St-Pierre
